Posts.Content: Coolrunnings wrote: Hi, Wanted to update. Been seen by 2 doctors in past couple weeks. They noted an indentation on side of breast(2 to 3 in.) And a couple of sm. Indent on areola along w/ lots of redness. I am scheduled for a bilateral diagnostic mammogram w/ultrasound this tues April 30. I am so ready for the right. answers---hope to get to the bottom of what's going on with my breasts and body. I have been feeling more and more unwell. Thanks again for reading And thanks for letting me post for the past year.... Log in to post a reply
